video_title: Building AI Apps: From Idea to Viral in 30 Days

content_profile.title: Building AI Apps: From Idea to Viral in 30 Days

key_takeaways: Solution: Take a first step with 3 hours of vibe coding a prototype or writing 'day one' post (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Apply progressive disclosure and chunking principles (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Using AI-generated memes for startup marketing (Channel: viral)
Growth Tactic: Building in public on social media (Channel: content)

startup_ideas.title: Peak for nutrition/health - AI-powered food tracking and dietary advice
startup_ideas.target_market: Health-conscious individuals wanting better food tracking
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Making nutrition tracking more enjoyable and less overwhelming
startup_ideas.validation: Apply same principles as Peak but for nutrition data

startup_ideas.title: Peak for X - applying the same behavioral science principles to other life areas
startup_ideas.target_market: People wanting to improve productivity, health, or other life areas
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Making complex life management decisions more bite-sized and enjoyable
startup_ideas.validation: Use same progressive disclosure and conversational UI principles
